author: gertv
msg: SM-1654: Allow for non-xml message body inside Camel route

author: skitching
msg: Add support for new "viewId" property of a FlowCall, ie where the view to call is specified directly rather than in a JSF navigation-case.

author: skitching
msg: Replace FlowConfig component with a FlowCall component, and allow multiple FlowCall components within a page.

author: skitching
msg: Refactor so that the body of a flowCall or flowAccept element can be parsed independently.
This allows us to create a JSF component that just represents a flowCall.

author: skitching
msg: Add the ability for a FlowCall to specify a viewId to navigate to.
